body.name: Mixweer Locker Rugs 12'' x 12'' Locker Decor Fur Rug Faux Area Rug, Square Carpet Aesthetic Soft Fuzzy Fur Pad for School Nail Art Product Display Floor Decor (Vibrant Colors, 14 Pcs)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 56 mins
features: Proper Dimension to Apply: our locker rug measures about 12 x 12 inches, suitable for most school lockers; You will receive 14 pieces of rugs in 6 colors, namely white, pink, blue, tan, purple and gray, bright and classic, adding a touch of color to your locker

Soft and Nonslip: our fur carpet is made of artificial fur sheepskin, soft and fluffy, comfortable to touch; Non slip backing allows the sheepskin rug to stay in place and not slide easily, so you can use it with confidence

Protective Function: our locker fur rug carpet has soft and fluffy characteristics, which will not hurt the surface of the locker; It can also protect your locker and avoid your locker from being broken and scratched

Ideal Gift for Students: our fluffy seat covers are nice gifts for your sons or daughters who will return to school, and you can also send them to classmates or fellows, which will bring fun for kids in holiday; With neutral and minimalist style, our soft and fluffy sheepskin seat covers fit most people, and they can be also applied as chair covers, sofa mats, table mats and more

Easy Care: our fluffy chair pads are easy to care for, just simply wash them gently by hand and then dry them outdoors, or you can also put it in a laundry bag, machine wash it in cold water; With quality material, they are not prone to fiber shedding or fading, easy to clean, bringing you much convenience
body.description: Features: You can send the chair cushion cover to people you love and care about, such as your family members, friends, neighbors, relatives, colleagues and more. They will be grateful for your kindness, and your relationships will be promoted. Our fluffy seat cover can be applied not only as a locker rug, but also as a table mat, chair cover, sofa mat and more. With soft texture, it can give you a comfortable using experience. Specifications: Material: artificial fur sheepskin Color: as pictures shown Size: approx. 12 x 12 inches/ 30 x 30 cm Package includes: 14 x Locker rugs Warm notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
